sec.p: Whole brain was collected from a single adult male bird, snap-frozen, and stored in RNAlater (Thermo Fisher Scientific) until processing. This bird is the same as the reference genome individual [ 6]. Whole blood was collected from the same individual from the carotid artery after euthanization. Approval was received for this from the Animal Experiment Committee from the Royal Netherlands Academy of Sciences (DEC-KNAW) under protocol number CTE-0705 Adendum I.
